buildCommand: if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then export DIRECT_DATABASE_URL="${DIRECT_DATABASE_URL:-$DATABASE_URL}"; npm run db:generate || echo "[build] prisma generate failed; continuing"; npm run db:push || echo "[build] prisma db push failed; continuing"; if [ "$SEED_DEFAULT_USERS" = "true" ]; then npm run db:seed || echo "[build] db:seed failed; continuing"; else echo "[build] SEED_DEFAULT_USERS not set; skipping db:seed"; fi; else echo "[build] DATABASE_URL not set; skipping prisma generate/db push"; fi; npm run build
